profile:
As a family owned and run business since 1993 and started in Ajax Ontario, we pride ourselves in the fact that our company has been through a recession in our earliest of years and have built our name on our reputation for quality landscapes, professional services, and superior craftsmanship our clients rely on and refer without hesitation.

Landscape companies are distinguished by what they provide, how they provide it and the price in which that costs.  We have been around to prove that you get what you pay for.  Our landscape designs are unique to every property owner, and our landscaped projects are as detailed as you need.  TWG Landscaping will incorporate plants that will expand on your project and soften the hardscaping.  Landscapes should fit the property, and grow with the family. 

Big or small, every project receives the same professional services...

Serving the Durham Region of Ontario since 1993, encompassing Pickering, Ajax, Whitby, Oshawa, Bowmanville, Courtice, Newcastle, Port Perry Ontario and surrounding communities for the past 27+ years, we pride ourselves in adapting to the needs of our clients...Our clients are moving and asking us to move too...For that reason, TWG Landscaping not only serves the usual areas out of our Bowmanville private yard, but we now have office in Northumberland County central to Quinte and Clarington so we can service all our clients, past and present where they need our services.

profile:
Outdoor Lighting Perspectives is the world's largest full-service outdoor lighting company, and we are proud to have our fixtures enjoyed at more than 150,000+ homes across North America. 

Whatever your outdoor lighting needs, we have the experience and expertise to get it done right the first time.

WHAT WE DO:

We want to transform your outdoor living spaces in the best way possible. Some of our exquisite outdoor lighting options include:

-Accent lighting to subtly show off your property’s best features
-Architectural lighting to highlight your home’s unique beauty
-Pool lighting to keep your nightly swims safe
-Patio and deck lights to add excitement to your nighttime entertaining
-Garden lighting to accentuate your stunning landscaping
-Path lighting to guide your guests where they need to go
-Up-lighting for home facade, trees, and outdoor artwork

From a single small garden that needs just a touch of light, to a sprawling estate home that needs lighting with zone control automation, we offer it all.

Call us today for a free at-home consultation, and one of our lighting designers will make a customs lighting design for your unique property.

WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT:

We are dedicated outdoor lighting designers and installers. We do one thing, and we do it the best. We aren't a sprinkler company or lawn care company moonlighting in outdoor lights when times are slow. We will be here to take the call when your lights need maintenance years down the road.

We manufacture our lights by hand, mostly in the United States but some right here in Toronto, so we can control the entire chain of quality from raw materials to your beautiful garden. 

Our designers, installers, and service crews are all our own staff: we do not use sub-contractors. With Outdoor Lighting Perspectives, your satisfaction is guaranteed in writing and backed by our 30 year on-site warranty.

THE TRUSTWORTHY CHOICE:

How can you find an outdoor lighting contractor you can trust to get the work done right, on time, and safely? 

We have been independently vetted by a third-party for our complete and up-to-date liability insurance and workers compensation coverage, our safety and training compliance, and our long established track record of happy customer referrals and testimonials. 

Companies claiming to do lighting come and go, but we're celebrating 20 years and our warranty is backed by our international network of 60+ locations. We'll install your lights today, but we'll also maintain them for years to come.

THE NEXT STEP:

We offer free design consultations and free quotes. Please contact us to discuss your outdoor lighting needs and how we can be of assistance.

profile: Algonquin Property Services Inc is a family-owned, full-service landscaping company that has been in operation since 1997. The owners, Steve and Samantha Bell, have always had a love for nature and the outdoors. The company’s name was inspired by one of their favourite Canadian parks. Their hope is to convey the tranquil feeling of being in nature on your own property. Starting with a staff of only three in the landscaping and snow removal business, the company has now grown to a staff of over 30.  As a family-run company, their three children have grown up with the business and have naturally absorbed the skills. Learning through hands-on experience and through studying horticulture at Humber College, they have fallen in love with this rewarding industry and are excited to continue to grow. We are specialized in landscape maintenance, landscape construction, snow removal, and window cleaning jobs. We provide property services in Durham Region and the GTA. Contact us.
name: Algonquin Property Services Inc

profile:
Landscaping Contractors & Designers, Interlocking Stone.

OWNERSHIP AND CREDENTIALS
Hofstetter Landscaping is owned and operated by Rick and Ashleigh Hofstetter. Our “baby” was born in 1989 and is now 23 years old. (In case you’re wondering how old we are...suffices to say we are evergreens. :-)  Did we tell you we are a landscaping company?) 
From the beginning, we have always endeavoured to do the best quality work possible for our clients. We specialize in landscaping and that’s one of the reasons our “baby” has no siblings—no sister companies, no associates, no partners, no branches. Landscaping is what we do and we do it really well.

A TORONTO LANDSCAPING COMPANY WITH A DIFFERENCE
Ever since we started, and even more so now, we find the market exploding with Toronto landscaping companies that make a big noise about “cheap, cheap”. Now, if they were selling birds, it would be okay, but they are not, right? And yet, we often lose a job to a cheap company that “specializes” in being a “Jack-of-all-trades”. Do we want to compete with them? No. But does that mean we are frightfully expensive? Not at all! In fact, our goal is always to ensure that our customers get the best value for money and a landscape that makes them the envy of the neighbourhood without breaking the bank.

As we come across customers who do their due diligence by comparing quotes, we are very mindful and respectful of the fact that one needs to be price conscious. It’s when we are told about a competitive quote that implies “the other guy” can get the job done for less than it costs us to buy quality materials, the alarm bells go off. He needs a hefty deposit from you to pay his guys for the last job done, and of course, there is always that famous curbside taillight guarantee!

We would like to go on and tell you what we have learned and found out in these past 23 years but you wouldn't be able to read it all...

WHY YOU SHOULD CHOOSE TO ENGAGE OUR LANDSCAPING SERVICES IN TORONTO 

All we want to say is this—we do top quality work with a guarantee you can count on, every single time. If it’s not to your liking we'll do what it takes to make it right. We'll be there in years to come, particularly if the weather has given the work a beating. 

•	We are fully covered with 5 million liability insurance and WSIB approved. 
•	Our crew is safety certified or they don't work for us. 
•	Our business has City of Toronto licensing.
•	Each team member has government ID.
•	We pay our taxes and are an ethical, honest, law-abiding enterprise.

Yes, you will find cheaper Toronto landscaping companies out there. Will you find one better than us in terms of reputation for quality work and customer references? Not likely. 

Please visit our website (www.HofstetterLandscaping.com) or call us today at 647-955-8382 to book a free, no obligation landscaping consultation in Toronto.

profile:
Dynamic Brick and Stone
We are a company that builds and repairs stone and brick. 
Our goal as a company is achieving total customer satisfaction. Our passion is designing and building quality, one of a kind, stone and brick features for your home.

We build and design
Fireplaces, walkways, patios, back splashes, outdoor and indoor walls, dry-lay stone walls and artistic centerpieces.
And so much more! 

Replace and repair services include:

Replace all damaged brick and stone, 
Repair all cracked or damaged joints,
Replace broken or damaged flagstone,
Sealing or re-sealing flagstone,

profile:
Filedmasters Synthetic Grass is second to none in the synthetic turf industry. Since 1991 we have provided the Canadian market with high-quality artificial turf products that are ideal for putting or golf greens, playgrounds, landscaping and more. 

Due to increasing water shortages and environmental concerns regarding chemicals and lawn fertilizers, more homeowners, business owners, and city governments are opting to install our products. Our synthetic grass eliminates the need for constant maintenance such as irrigation, mowing, fertilizing, aerating and more.

Fieldmasters products are durable, versatile, safe, economical and 100% recyclable. Most importantly, they look and feel so much like real natural sod that they enhance the look of any residential or commercial landscape. We are proud to offer our clients a high-quality product that will stand the test of time.

We also offer ull landscape and design for residential, recreational and commercial properties.

Residential: Grass replacement (back yard, front yard, balconies, roof tops), pool deck covering, interlocking patios, retaining walls, fencing, path ways and flag stones. 

Recreational: Sports fields such as soccer, football, lacrosse and lawn bowling.

Commercial: Day cares, community centers,  dog kennels, dog spas, gold centers, fitness centers.

....and many more!

- We are proudly Canadian
- We are located in GTA, in turn can provide quick response as required
- Proven success various of installation (installers are certified)
- Our product is North American made from one of the largest artificial turf manufacturer in the world. They are leaders in manufacturing artificial turf for various uses, industries and geographic locations
- We’ve been in business for 25+ years.
- Our turf is technologically advanced synthetic turf system that is engineered for durability, performance, and appearance
- Our backing is a premium design/quality, resulting in better drainage, better suited for pet management and weed prevention
- Our product is 100% made from new materials, no part of the turf is recycled or has been used previously
- Our product is 100% recyclable, heaven forbid you wanted to remove it
- Our product is 100% lead free and fire tested (have certifications to prove it)
- Our product doesn’t attract insects, animals won’t eat it, weed will not grow through it,  it’s allergen-free, and accidents wash right through
- Our product is designed to deter against various elements: high human and non-human traffic, heavy rain, heavy snow, high winds, high sun
- 10 year limited warranty
- Fully insured and WSIB
- Many references (see the pictures for a small sample of what we have accomplished)
name: Fieldmasters Synthetic Grass & Landscape Design

profile:
Welcome to Simply Exquisite, we are a construction and renovations general contractor in Toronto, serving the GTA and surrounding areas.

For over 20 years we have worked with property and homeowners providing them with high caliber commercial and home renovation services. We have earned our reputation as one of the best general contractors in the GTA through our trade expertise and professionalism. We are customer-service driven, pay extra attention to details, and deliver a quality product, on time and budget.

We approach every project with this simply promise: Every home renovation, general contracting, and construction project will be Simply Exquisite. That is our guarantee.

Whether you are looking to do a home renovation in Toronto, from kitchen design and renovations, to bathroom remodels and basement finishing, or something smaller like having your kitchen refaced or installing basement heated flooring, you can trust the best construction company in Toronto to give you the peace of mind of a job well done.

We offer award-winning renovation services that come with a 5-year warranty. We provide in-house design services and counseling, free of charge, with a licensed architectural designer. We extend this added value with every one of our projects so that you can be sure that your project will satisfy your needs.
services: We specialize in design and renovation services for kitchens, bathrooms, basements, landscaping and more!
specialities: Kitchens, bathrooms, basements, and full home renovations.

profile:
My Mission is to help bring your dreams/visions to life while working within your budget. I believe anything is possible.  Our team/crew is constantly researching new building trends and design techniques so we can share them with you. I built this company based on affordable pricing and extreme attention to detail.  I love educating  clients as questions come up, regarding our process during your installation.  I understand, through my 10 years of experience, that changes come up and I work with you on  getting your finished product exactly how you want it.  I offer free estimates and typically meet a few additional times before, depending on the project size.  My crew and I are very meticulous when it comes to detail, spacing, cutting, and finishing.  We also value going the extra mile when it comes to ensuring long lasting products-  depth of excavation/posts for our outdoor projects,   proper waterproofing techniques for our bathrooms,  framing/electrical/plumbing to code,  permits when needed, for our kitchens and basements, ect.  I have been told by previous clients that my crew and I are very professional, clean and polite.  Our passion and love for what we do is demonstrated everyday on our project sites.   We look forward to working with you!            

Things I value most-
-Honesty
-Safety
-long lasting product
-Communication
​-Quality
-Design​

Contact us for a free quote and we'll come to you to discuss whatever you have in mind!

WSIB. INSURED. DEPENDABLE. QUALITY. 

Michael Durham Landscaping is an insured, growing business ready to continue growing and take on your next landscape or property maintenance project let us work hard so you don't have to! We provide a wide array of work such as;
Snow Plowing
Shrub/Tree removal
Gardening
landscape material installation/ delivery
Sod installation
Planting/trimming/pruning 
Lawn cutting & property maintenance
Spring/summer/fall cleanup
Pool Demolition

We support Feed the Need Durham
Michael Durham Landscaping is a proud supporter of Feed the Need Durham.

We are pleased to announce: with every new customer with a closed sale this year, Michael Durham Landscaping will be donating $5 to Feed the Need Durham.
services:
YARD MAINTENANCE PACKAGES
Michael Durham Landscaping provides several yard maintenance packages to suit your outdoor needs.
SEASONAL CLEANUP PACKAGES
Each season requires special services to get things looking their best and off to a good start for the season.
Tree and Shrub Removal
Large or small we can remove unwanted or problem trees and shrubs, Michael Durham Landscaping has the experience and equipment to get the job done.
SHORT TERM PROJECTS
Do you have that short term lawn or garden project which needs some attention?  We can take care of it for you. 
ONE-OFF PROJECTS
Perhaps your project isn't so short term but it needs to be done. Please contact Michael Durham Landscaping to make it happen.
CREATIVE SOLUTIONS
When you have a problem area outside and don't know what to do we can provide creative solutions to most issues.
